title: FOCUS - font id
content:
Anybody familiar with this thick script font? Anything that might be similar?

many thanks in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1319148372170_x4wGHSL0_g_6244.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1319148372170\_x4wGHSL0\_g.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063618/http:/typophile.com/files/1319148372170_x4wGHSL0_g.jpg) | 23.17 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: my brain wants it to be [Grove Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063618/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/grove-script-rr/) but the s is not right. looks like a mod to the u as well. perhaps someone redid their own s?
